scripts.deploy:frontend:prod: npx cdk deploy clubwoof-website-prod --force --toolkit-stack-name cdk-toolkit-master --require-approval never --outputs-file ../outputs/base-url-prod.json
scripts.deploy:backend:prod: npx cdk deploy clubwoof-backend-prod --force --toolkit-stack-name cdk-toolkit-master --require-approval never --outputs-file ../outputs/cdk-exports-prod.json
scripts.deploy:all:prod: npm run deploy-backend-prod && npm run deploy-frontend-prod
scripts.deploy:frontend:dev: npx cdk deploy clubwoof-website-dev --force --toolkit-stack-name cdk-toolkit-master --require-approval never --outputs-file ../outputs/base-url-dev.json
scripts.deploy:backend:dev: npx cdk deploy clubwoof-backend-dev --force --toolkit-stack-name cdk-toolkit-master --require-approval never --outputs-file ../outputs/cdk-exports-dev.json
scripts.deploy:all:dev: npm run deploy-backend-dev && npm run deploy-frontend-dev
